creator: syu@sybase.com
text:
WriterAppender uses the system default charset when logging messages to files.
If the system default of my machine is ISO8859-1, all messages output to the log
will be converted from Unicode to ISO8859-1, causing all messages in languages
other than latin languages to become questions marks in the output log file.

creator: ceki@apache.org
text: See the recently introduced WriterAppender.setEncoding method.
